verses.verse: <S%H310>After<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> had <S%H1540>carried<s%> <S%H1540>away<s%> <S%H1540>captive<s%> <S%H3204>Jeconiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and the <S%H8269>officials<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> with the <S%H2796>craftsmen<s%> and <S%H4525>smiths<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and had <S%H935>brought<s%> them to <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7200>showed<s%> me: <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1731>baskets<s%> of <S%H8384>figs<s%> <S%H3259>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord!<s%>

<S%H259>One<s%> <S%H1731>basket<s%> had <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8384>figs,<s%> like first-ripe <S%H8384>figs;<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H1731>basket<s%> had <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7451>bad<s%> <S%H8384>figs,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> could not be <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H4480>due<s%> to <S%H7455>rottenness.<s%>

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H4100>"What<s%> do you <S%H7200>see,<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>?" And I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8384>"Figs,<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8384>figs,<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2896>good;<s%> and the <S%H7451>bad<s%> [figs,] <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7451>bad,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> be <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H4480>due<s%> to <S%H7455>rottenness.<s%>"
Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> 'Like <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8384>figs,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> I will <S%H5234>regard<s%> as <S%H9186>good<s%> the <S%H1546>captives<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> out of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> [into] the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans.<s%>

'For I will <S%H7760>set<s%> My <S%H5869>eyes<s%> on them for <S%H9186>good,<s%> and I will <S%H7725>bring<s%> them <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H776>land;<s%> and I will <S%H1129>build<s%> them up and not <S%H2040>overthrow<s%> them, and I will <S%H5193>plant<s%> them and not <S%H5428>pluck<s%> [them] up.

'And I will <S%H5414>give<s%> them a <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> Me, for I am the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> and they will be My <S%H5971>people,<s%> and I will be their <S%H430>God,<s%> for they will <S%H7725>return<s%> to Me with their <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

'But like the <S%H7451>bad<s%> <S%H8384>figs<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> be <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H4480>due<s%> to <S%H7455>rottenness<s%> – <S%H3588>indeed,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> – <S%H3651>so<s%> I will <S%H5414>abandon<s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and his <S%H8269>officials,<s%> and the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> who <S%H7604>remain<s%> in <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> and the ones who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

'And I will <S%H5414>make<s%> them a <S%H2113>terror<s%> [and an] <S%H9567>evil<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> as a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> and a <S%H4912>proverb,<s%> a <S%H8148>taunt<s%> and a <S%H7045>curse<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4725>places<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> I shall <S%H5080>scatter<s%> them.

'And I will <S%H7971>send<s%> the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> upon them <S%H5704>until<s%> they are <S%H8552>destroyed<s%> from the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H5414>gave<s%> to them and their forefathers.' "
